ygData.subject: RE: SORRY!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I quite enjoyed your story.  Don t feel bad about sending it here, after all, we re all bards and love to hear a good tale.  Keep them coming! Elwyn
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I quite enjoyed your story. Don't feel bad about sending it here,
after all, we're all bards and love to hear a good tale. Keep them coming!


Elwyn Heartstring
35th Level Bard
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:WebberJ@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 7:59 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] SORRY!!!!


From: "Webber, Jessica" <WebberJ@...>

Do'oh!!! That last message was supposed to go to my "eqbuddies" not
"eqbards". Slight accident with the check-names feature of Outlook. Very
sorry about that, especially if my language was offensive. Please ignore.

Thanks
Web, newbie Outlook user
